metadata.title: CVE-2020-11669 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2 on the powerpcplatform. arch/powerpc/kernel/idle_book3s.S does not have save/restorefunctionality for PNV_POWERSAVE_AMR, PNV_POWERSAVE_UAMOR, andPNV_POWERSAVE_AMOR, aka CID-53a712bae5dd.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
